tool_description: Get resources, from anywhere, no headhaches
name: ResidentialProxies
title: ResidentialProxies

api_list.name: get content, all options
api_list.description:
Get http content, with:
- rotated residential proxies
- automated failover
- select proxy country
- accept & reusing cookie, when requested by the server
- force proxy switch (not only automation)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://residentialproxies.p.rapidapi.com/proxy"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "residentialproxies.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
